ability_1_base_buff: {crit} chance to trigger a CRIT when clearing, gain {crit_damage} bonus points on CRIT
ability_1_extra_buff_1: When clearing >1 row in a single move, CRIT Rate increases by 20
ability_1_extra_buff_2: When clearing >1 row in a single move, gain 100 extra points on CRIT
ability_2_base_buff: When clearing >2 rows in one move, each additional row cleared grants {multi_clear} bonus points (up to 2 rows)
ability_2_extra_buff_1: Triggers when clearing >1 row in a single move, increasing the maximum bonus row limit by 1
ability_2_extra_buff_2: Clearing >1 row in a single move counts as clearing 4 rows
ability_3_base_buff: When the number of rows of blocks on the field exceeds 10, gain an extra {height} points for each additional row cleared
ability_3_extra_buff_1: Maximum height required for effect to trigger reduced to 5
ability_3_extra_buff_2: When the maximum height exceeds 15 rows, gain an extra 10% points for each additional row cleared
ability_4_base_buff: When clearing rows with Lucky Blocks, get an extra {lucky} points for each row cleared
ability_4_extra_buff_2: Lucky blocks will no longer lose their lucky effect when saved
ability_locked_desc: Unlocks after progressing to Week {n} in the event schedule
agreement_block_tip: Please agree to the Terms of Service
award_success_toast: Share successful! Rewards will be sent via in-game mail within 15 minutes
award_title: Congrats! You've obtained the following rewards:
date_desc_1: Surprises, confetti, and angelic smiles — the perfect recipe for wild delusions.
date_desc_2: As our dance steps move past old challenges, what awaits our angels in the future? Why, brand new challenges, of course!
date_desc_3: In the first half of your singing, I felt your dreams... And in the second half? I felt... the struggle.
date_desc_4: Fun fact: getting a good night's sleep and having sweet dreams is also a way to "train" yourself to face your delusions~
date_desc_5: Let's face the final test with the best of the Angels of Delusion spirit!
date_locked_desc: Angels of Delusion training in progress...
gal-line-043a7180-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Alright! That's it for this week's training. Thanks for all your hard work, everyone!
gal-line-043a7181-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm, everyone's been practicing really hard this week. I can see improvement in quite a few aspects.
gal-line-043a7182-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: True. Even Sunna's performance has gotten pretty impressive. Our assistant coaches are something else~
gal-line-043a7183-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: W—W—What do you mean! I've been working so hard, okay!
gal-line-043a7184-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Ahem! It's all thanks to the assistant coaches! We'll keep up the good work next week!
gal-line-043a7185-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Mhm~ Alright then, we'll head back to review our training session and work on next week's training plan.
gal-line-043a7186-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Take a good rest over the weekend, everyone. It's important to balance work and rest. See you next week.
gal-line-043a7187-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Um... are the assistant coaches offline now?
gal-line-043a7188-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Yep, the camera is off now~
gal-line-043a7189-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: The signal shows that the assistant coaches have disconnected...
gal-line-043a718a-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Ugh... I can't take it anymore. I can't move at all... Nangong, help me turn over...
gal-line-043a718b-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Just standing here is taking all my energy, so you better stay put and rest up~
gal-line-043a718c-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Even though the training was super intense, we've made some serious progress this week!
gal-line-043a718d-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah, and to be honest, I was kinda skeptical about the assistant coaches at first~
gal-line-043a718e-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmph~ I remember someone saying that these cheap commissions posted online would only attract scammers~
gal-line-043a718f-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Right? The coaching fees are super cheap... but they are so professional and dedicated!
gal-line-043a7190-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Wait... I'm getting suspicious. Nangong, you haven't been doing anything like... using your own money to cover costs...
gal-line-043a7191-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Wh—What... No way, of course not!
gal-line-043a7193-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Ahem! The assistant coaches are seriously professional and always manage to get some amazing assistants to help... I gotta say, I'm pretty impressed!
gal-line-043a7194-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Ahh, already looking forward to next week's training~
gal-line-043a7195-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Hold up, Nangong. You better explain this to us!
gal-line-06daa460-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: ♪ Ahh la la la la la— ♪
gal-line-06daa462-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: It makes me so happy to hear you sing my song, Aria!
gal-line-06daa464-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm? Judging by Aria's expression, she seems... a little unsatisfied...
gal-line-06daa465-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: This happens all the time~ Aria is very strict about her own singing.
gal-line-06daa466-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: But to amateurs like us, she already sounds amazing! I honestly can't hear anything wrong with it...
gal-line-06daa467-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Even in the eyes of professionals, she sings incredibly well!
gal-line-06dacb70-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: But you know... Aria has her own standards when it comes to music, and she won't rest until she finds that perfect solution~
gal-line-06dacb71-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Um, sorry everyone, could we try it together one more time?
gal-line-06dacb72-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Of course! When I kept messing up, you went over the dance steps with me again and again, didn't you?
gal-line-06dacb75-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Even though I've heard it before, I still can't help but marvel... Aria, your voice is just heavenly.
gal-line-06dacb77-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: But judging by Aria's expression, she still seems a bit unsatisfied...
gal-line-06dacb78-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: S—Sorry! Maybe to the assistant coaches, my singing already sounds pretty good...
gal-line-06dacb79-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: But I can feel it myself, there was one part I didn't handle quite right when I was singing that song...
gal-line-06dacb7a-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: This tiny flaw might slip by at first, but it still disrupts the harmony of the whole song...
gal-line-06dacb7b-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Can you give me a moment to think it through? ...Please! You can all go on with the rest of your training for now.
gal-line-06dacb7c-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Alright, Aria. Think it over for a bit while we work on the dance part.
gal-line-06dacb7d-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: ...Thank you, assistant coach, for giving Aria the chance to work on it.
gal-line-06dacb7e-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: But... isn't Aria being a bit too hard on herself? Most people probably wouldn't even notice that tiny flaw...
gal-line-06dacb7f-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: No, to Aria, that flaw is something she absolutely has to eliminate.
gal-line-06dacb80-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: She's the one among us... who cherishes the stage the most.
gal-line-06dacb81-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Being able to sing for others is probably more important to her than anything else.
gal-line-06dacb82-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah! Aria has her own principles, and as her teammates, we should support her unconditionally!
gal-line-06dacb83-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: And everything she does is for the sake of giving everyone an even better performance!
gal-line-06dacb84-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Heh, it seems we assistant coaches still have plenty to think about...
gal-line-06dacb85-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: I've got it! If I add a small vocal run before that high note, it should smooth out that rough spot!
gal-line-06dacb86-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Huh? Aria, did you figure out a solution?
gal-line-06dacb87-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Mm-hmm! Listen! —♪ La la la la la~ ♪
gal-line-06dacb88-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Wow! It's just a tiny change, but it really sounds completely different now!
gal-line-06dacb89-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: As expected of our "Perfect Idol," Aria~
gal-line-06dacb8a-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Nangong, you always say that... You're making me blush!
gal-line-15f72760-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: And there you go. Welcome to our training room, exalted assistant coaches~
gal-line-15f72761-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Ooh~ The place is pretty neat! Let me see... First thing we should do is...
gal-line-15f72762-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Let's start with a skill assessment to get a basic understanding of the Angels of Delusion members.
gal-line-15f72763-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Right, right! Now then, let's have everyone take a quick little test~
gal-line-1bdbe6d0-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: I mean, I'm kinda flattered you called me for help, but I honestly don't know much about this whole idol stuff...
gal-line-1bdbe6d1-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: It's okay! Remember when you did that poster shoot before? It's pretty similar to that...
gal-line-1bdbe6d2-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Nangong, you rascal! How could you do that again?!
gal-line-1bdbe6d3-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Aaaaah! N—No no wait, I wasn't scared! *Ahem ahem*!
gal-line-1bdbe6d4-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Waaah, Sunna's being a big meanie and picking on me~
gal-line-1bdbe6d5-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Nangong, there aren't even any tears on your face!
gal-line-1bdbe6d7-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Oh, it's the assistant coaches! Well, here's what happened...
gal-line-1bdbe6d8-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: We had it all arranged. In the morning, we were supposed to take a long-distance bus to the Outer Ring for the recording...
gal-line-1bdbe6d9-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: But right as we were about to leave, a black luxury car suddenly pulled up at the intersection, and — whoosh — it whisked us straight to the destination...
gal-line-1bdbe6da-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: This must've been a car Nangong booked in secret! She clearly promised me she wouldn't use her own money to support the Angels of Delusion anymore!
gal-line-1bdbe6db-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: It's just that the Outer Ring is too far away~ If we took a bus to the studio, everyone would probably be worn out before we even got there...
gal-line-1bdbe6dc-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Alright, alright~ Aria, take Sunna to cool down a bit. We still have training today.
gal-line-1bdbe6dd-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: *sigh*~ That troublesome Sunna... She never understands how hard I'm trying for her~
gal-line-1bdbe6de-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm... I think Sunna has a good reason to be angry.
gal-line-1bdbe6e0-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Huh? You all think I messed up...? Even Sunna's always telling me not to be wasteful when it's not necessary...
gal-line-1bdbe6e1-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm... I think Miss Sunna might be feeling a little lonely.
gal-line-1bdbe6e3-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah! It's that feeling of not being trusted and being left out. Actually, people around me often say I lack a sense of money...
gal-line-1bdbe6e4-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hahaha, that's true! She almost became the boss of the Outer Ring biker crew... and she even signed up video-store memberships for everyone on the street!
gal-line-1bdbe6e5-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: N—No, stop talking about it! ...Yeah, I did those things, but my friends... weren't as happy about it as I imagined.
gal-line-1bdbe6e6-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Because Dennies can't solve everything, and that's not the reason friends stay by your side.
gal-line-1bdbe6e7-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm, so instead of solving everything with Dennies, it's better to talk things through with your friends first... That's a life lesson a friend taught me!
gal-line-1bdbe6e8-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Your teammates might be a little upset because they feel you're not trying to figure things out together with them.
gal-line-1bdbe6e9-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: They're your best friends and teammates, so... shouldn't you be honest with them before taking action?
gal-line-1bdbe6ea-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Is that so... So that's how you think they feel... Actually, those two are the ones I trust the most.
gal-line-1bdbe6eb-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: But some things can only be conveyed properly when you say them out loud.
gal-line-1bdc0de0-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm, thank you, assistant coaches. I think... I understand what I should do now.
gal-line-1bdc0de1-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: This training feels more like mental growth than improving techniques~
gal-line-1bdc0de4-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Waaah, Sunna's being a big meanie and picking on me~
gal-line-1bdc0de5-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm? After talking with Alice yesterday, Nangong should've already understood...
gal-line-1bdc0de6-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hey Wise... This might just be a hunch, but what if Nangong actually did it on purpose this time?
gal-line-1bdc0de7-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm... Now that you put it that way...
gal-line-2b691d10-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Our voices and dance moves are totally in sync with this...
gal-line-2b691d11-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: It's amazing how they can convert all the performance actions into blocks, and then guide our training by manipulating these blocks...
gal-line-2b691d12-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: This way, the training content becomes visualized and the training targets become super clear~
gal-line-2b694420-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: I—I—I've never seen skills like this before! You're amazing, assistant coaches!
gal-line-2b694422-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Hey assistant coaches, what's our next training session gonna be?
gal-line-2b694423-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Hey Sunna~ I know you're eager, but hold on a sec — have you forgotten something important?
gal-line-2b694424-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: S—Something really important... Oh! You mean that cele— mmph!
gal-line-2b694425-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah, yeah, yeah! That's the thing we promised our teacher~ The daily training check-in! Haven't done today's check-in yet!
gal-line-2b694426-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah, assistant coaches, please come over here too~
gal-line-2b694427-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Ta-da! Did we startle you, assistant coaches?
gal-line-2b694428-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Aaah! Nangong, why did you shoot the party poppers at me? Now there's confetti stuck in my hair!
gal-line-2b694429-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmph~ That's what you get for almost spoiling the surprise, you silly goose!
gal-line-2b69442a-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: H—Hold on a sec. Guess we're trying to say — thank you so much for accepting our commission and agreeing to train us!
gal-line-2b69442b-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Mhm... We'll train super duper hard! A—Absolutely no slacking off!
gal-line-2b69442c-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Hey now, at this special welcome party for our assistant coaches, shouldn't we have something more important to say?
gal-line-2b69442d-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Alright then, let's say it together — three, two, one —
gal-line-2b69442e-c5ef-11f0-af61-9184941: Welcome to the Angels of Delusion training squad, assistant coaches!
gal-line-412ea670-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Sunna, don't forget to change your hand gesture on the third beat~
gal-line-412ecd80-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Aria, shouldn't you take a break? Your high notes sound a bit more strained than usual.
gal-line-412ecd82-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: What's wrong... why are the assistant coaches staring at me like that? Hmm~ Could it be...
gal-line-412ecd83-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Do you want to join our practice session too, assistant coaches?
gal-line-412ecd84-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: No, no! It's just that... seeing how seriously Nangong is taking care of everyone...
gal-line-412ecd85-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: You've got that leader vibe going.
gal-line-412ecd86-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: You're just like a big sis!
gal-line-412ecd87-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Eh~ Is that really what you think of me, assistant coaches?
gal-line-412ecd88-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Haha, come to think of it, with two little ones to look after, I really am the "big sis" here~
gal-line-412ecd89-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmph! Nangong, you're so childish — you're no big sis at all!
gal-line-412ecd8a-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Ahhhh... Stop squishing my cheeks, I can't talk properly...
gal-line-412ecd8c-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: N—Nangong, did I... did I enunciate that previous part right?
gal-line-412ecd8d-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Wait, why are you suddenly patting my head...
gal-line-412ecd8e-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Now this one's a good kid!
gal-line-412ecd8f-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Good kids deserve a reward. You get to sing your favorite set of vocal exercises!
gal-line-412ecd90-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: You naughty kid... You still can't get that set of moves right. You're not going home until you do it properly!
gal-line-412ecd91-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Heh heh, bet you didn't see that coming. I was planning to put in extra practice anyway!
gal-line-412ecd92-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Well then, you can join the Good Kids Club too!
gal-line-412ecd94-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: What about me? What about me?!
gal-line-412ecd95-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: *sigh*... You should stay out of this mess.
gal-line-412ecd96-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: You two are my little assistant coaches helping me manage the kids~ Alright, chat time's over, let's get back to training!
gal-line-4aa8d030-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Proxy, will you really treat me to a burger after I complete this "Training Assistant" mission?
gal-line-4aa8d031-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Burger... Ah, yes, of course. Don't worry, Anby. Just make sure you help us get this assistant coach job done properly...
gal-line-4aa8d032-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: But I feel like Anby still hasn't quite figured out what being an "idol" actually means...
gal-line-4aa8d033-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Indeed... but it's fine. It shouldn't affect our work... probably...
gal-line-4aa8d034-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Hey, hold on, Wise. Aria looks like... she hasn't quite gotten into the right mindset yet?
gal-line-4aa8f741-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Ah... the assistant coaches! Sorry, sorry. I think I lagged out for a moment...
gal-line-4aa8f742-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: During the idol events, you need to stay alert at all times... Otherwise, you'll put yourself and your teammates in danger.
gal-line-4aa8f743-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: You really have no idea what being an idol is about! But I suppose you're not totally wrong...
gal-line-4aa8f744-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: You must be thinking about that incident with Astra. Yeah, that one was pretty dangerous, haha...
gal-line-4aa8f745-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: I may not really get what you're talking about... but it's about combat, right? Th—That's something I actually know a bit about!
gal-line-4aa8f746-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Combat...? Wait, Aria, aren't you an idol? Don't tell me you all have secret missions to carry out?
gal-line-4aa8f747-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Nah, it's not like that... Our agency is always short on money, so we have to dive into the Hollow to make ends meet...
gal-line-4aa8f748-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Over time, I've picked up a few tricks for fighting Ethereals... Nothing more than that!
gal-line-4aa8f749-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: If the fans of Angels of Delusion ever learned about this, they'd probably be worried about us...
gal-line-4aa8f74a-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: No, it's more than that... Maybe once they learn the truth behind what an "idol" really is, they'll...
gal-line-4aa8f74b-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Aria, you do know what a burger is, right?
gal-line-4aa8f74c-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Burger...? Y—Yeah, I know what that is!
gal-line-4aa8f74d-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Whether it's mustard or ketchup hiding under that bun, it doesn't change the fact that burgers are delicious.
gal-line-4aa8f74e-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Looks like... you're using burger as a metaphor!
gal-line-4aa8f74f-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah. Both the surface and what's inside are parts of who you really are... That's something my closest friends taught me, and now I'm passing it on to you.
gal-line-4aa8f750-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah, and Aria's desire to bring hope and happiness to everyone as an idol is something truly genuine.
gal-line-4aa8f751-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: A round of applause! That's our best training assistant!
gal-line-4aa8f752-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Genuine, huh... Hmm, I think I'm starting to understand something... Thanks, assistant coaches!
gal-line-4aa8f753-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: We just did what assistant coaches are supposed to do. Now that I think about it, you actually feel quite different on stage compared to off stage, Aria...
gal-line-4aa8f754-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah! You're full of energy on stage, but off stage... You seem a little shy!
gal-line-4aa8f755-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Huh? R—Really...? Maybe it's just that once I'm on stage, everything else slips right out of my mind...
gal-line-4aa8f756-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Like this— ♪ Aria's not nervous at all, her heart is filled only with her audience ♪
gal-line-4aa8f75a-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: Eh!? How did I start singing without even noticing...? And Nangong, Sunna, when did you suddenly...?
gal-line-4aa8f75b-c5c2-11f0-af61-9184941: ♪ Aria's not nervous at all, her heart is filled only with her audience ♪
gal-line-599a6b40-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Today's training session is a little special, and it's—
gal-line-599a6b42-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Well, since everyone's been practicing pretty hard lately, we've arranged a comment-reading session.
gal-line-599a6b44-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm~ Reading fan comments? I didn't know the assistant coaches had planned such an interesting event~
gal-line-599a9250-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah! I bet everyone has at least some idea of how their fans see them!
gal-line-599a9251-c5da-11f0-af61-9184941: However, going through the comments together should help everyone better grasp the team's overall style.

gal-line-a022c68f-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Um, b—because Aria and Nangong both have such unique styles, they shine so brightly on stage...
gal-line-a022c690-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: And I... I can't do much well. I'm just a former backstage staff member who got shoved onto the stage...
gal-line-a022c691-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Stop right there! Sunna, you are the soul of the Angels of Delusion. You can't just go around belittling yourself like that!
gal-line-a022c692-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Right, assistant coaches? Without Sunna, the Angels of Delusion would be like New Eridu without its music!
gal-line-a022c693-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah! Your music is what truly defines the delusions!
gal-line-a022c695-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah, Angels of Delusion was never a fully formed group. We're more like you, Sunna — growing and sprouting in our own clumsy, awkward way!
gal-line-a022c696-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Nangong... B—But do the fans really like me the way I am...?
gal-line-a022c697-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Of course! You have a charm that's completely your own, Sunna, something neither Aria nor Nangong has~
gal-line-a022c698-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Mhm. Actually, Sunna has quite a few loyal fans following her... Look!
gal-line-a022c699-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: "Sunna's dancing is getting better and better!", "She's so radiant, always improving!", "That's the true charm of training!"
gal-line-a022c69a-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Sunna, after seeing these comments, you can believe we weren't lying to you...
gal-line-a022c69b-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm~ The Sunna that keeps improving is an irreplaceable part of the ever-improving Angels of Delusion~
gal-line-a022c69c-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Xiao'Yu... Aria... and the two assistant coaches... *sniff*...
gal-line-a022c69d-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Oh, and this one! "Don't you think Sunna is the cutest when she's being clumsy, once you get used to it?" That's a compliment~
gal-line-a022c69f-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Honestly, where did you even find so many... comments like that?
gal-line-a022c6a0-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Mhm~ As an idol, listening to your fans is really important, you know!
gal-line-a022c6a1-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: As your ever-reliable assistant coach, I've already filtered out all the useful comments for you!
gal-line-a022c6a2-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Ah, looks like Fairy's moment to shine got squeezed out.
gal-line-a1067cf0-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: *Sigh* You know what they say online, "if it ain't broke, don't mess with the code"...
gal-line-a1067cf1-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Uh, I guess... we've experienced that firsthand now.
gal-line-a1067cf3-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Apologies, everyone. This situation really caught everyone off guard...
gal-line-a1067cf4-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Are you all... really going to take on this final test?
gal-line-a1067cf5-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Yeah, you can wait a bit until after we fix the system...
gal-line-a1067cf6-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Don't worry, assistant coaches~ Since this is the final training stage, a bit of an unexpected challenge is just what we need, right?
gal-line-a1067cf7-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Yeah! And this is kinda like the final stage we all created together, right? I think it'll be really meaningful for us to clear it as a group.
gal-line-a1067cf8-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: And besides... the assistant coaches are here too!
gal-line-a1067cf9-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: That's right, we've got the best assistant coaches on our side! So the Angels of Delusion will certainly claim our victory!
gal-line-a1067cfa-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Assistant coaches, let's start today's training!
gal-line-a1067cff-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: That's right, it's yours truly — a Starlight Knight who just happened to be passing by!
gal-line-a1067d00-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Mr. Starlight! Why would you show up at a time like this...
gal-line-a1067d01-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hey, wasn't this planned by the manag... assistant coaches? I got a link from them that said: "Please click and follow the instructions. Thank you for your support."
gal-line-a1067d02-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Could it be... Fair... our AI assistant?
gal-line-a1067d03-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Affirmative. As I always say, you can always trust your excellent AI assistant.
gal-line-a1067d04-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Detection complete: Target has passed Phase One of the test. Initiating Phase Two.
gal-line-a1067d05-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Waaaaaah! Here it comes again! And... it's even faster this time!
gal-line-a106a400-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Left, right... ugh, right again, I can barely keep up...
gal-line-a106a401-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Awoooo! Don't panic, Master Aria! Your backup has arrived!
gal-line-a106a402-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: What an adorable roar~ Master Tiger is here too!
gal-line-a106a403-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: A—A—Adorable...? Please don't say that about me, ughh...
gal-line-a106a404-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Sunna! Don't let your guard down, we're not done yet!
gal-line-a106a405-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: That's right, remember to stay focused on stage at all times~
gal-line-a106a406-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Even Ms. Fried Rice is here!
gal-line-a106a407-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: But that voice... Could it be... Astr...
gal-line-a106a408-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: *Ahem* You carry our assistant coaches' dedication and companionship, you know~ I won't let you lose here!
gal-line-a106a409-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: That's right, as a training assistant, I should step up when my students face difficulties.
gal-line-a106a40a-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: When push comes to shove, lil ol' me can be real serious too.
gal-line-a106a40b-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hey~ Here's a Nitro-Fuel drink for you guys!
gal-line-a106a40d-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: The teaching assistants, they've all come to support us...
gal-line-a106a40f-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: The test... it stopped. W—W—We won! It's over!
gal-line-a106a410-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Alert: Preliminary tests complete. Final test commencing.
gal-line-a106a412-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Whoa, so fast! Dang, I can't keep up with the pace at all!
gal-line-a106a413-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: I—I—I can't see the actions at all anymore, this is bad...
gal-line-a106a414-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Huh? Could it be... It's the assistant coaches!
gal-line-a106a415-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Sunna, Aria, Nangong! Hang in there! We'll do everything we can to help!
gal-line-a106a416-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Just a little bit more... and we'll clear this level!
gal-line-a106a417-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Master, based on current rhythm calculations, test failure will occur in 7 seconds.
gal-line-a106a418-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: After coming this far, is it still not enough...
gal-line-a106a419-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Damn it, don't you dare look down on us!
gal-line-a106a41a-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: How could we, the Angels of Delusion, end here!
gal-line-a106a41b-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: No matter how tough or bitter it gets, we'll never give up!
gal-line-a106a41c-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: We already made a promise with our teacher! We'll complete our training as the best versions of the Angels of Delusion!
gal-line-a106a41d-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: We've been... living in delusion... all this time...
gal-line-a106a41e-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Dreaming of the day when all of New Eridu will be singing our songs!
gal-line-a106a41f-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Dreaming that our music... can bring dreams to everyone!
gal-line-a106a420-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: I've already made a promise with Sunna and Aria...
gal-line-a106a421-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Until this delusion becomes reality... the Angels of Delusion will never stop... never!
gal-line-a106a423-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Did we... win? We won! Nangong! Sunna! We actually won!
gal-line-a106a424-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Heh heh~ I told you our delusions are invincible!
gal-line-a106a425-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: N—N—Nangong... Help me up... My legs have turned to jelly and I can't stand straight...
gal-line-a106a426-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Pfft, hahaha, is that really all you've got to say right now?
gal-line-a106a427-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: No way! Hey, don't let go! I really can't keep my balance!
gal-line-a106a428-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Come to think of it, there was never any "unplanned" stuff...
gal-line-a106a429-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Looks like every assistant received a support link from the HDD.
gal-line-a106a42a-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Whether it's everyone adjusting the system, or the Angels of Delusion breaking through the final test... All of this was part of Fairy's plan, wasn't it?
gal-line-a106a42b-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Come on Fairy, spill the tea~
gal-line-a106a42c-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Affirmative. Solving problems for Master and preventing issues before they arise — that's what the ultimate AI assistant should do.
gal-line-a106a42d-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Go ahead and soar bravely, Master. Fairy will always be by your side.
gal-line-a106a42e-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Wow, you're getting better and better at sweet talk. Where'd you pick up all these lines from, huh?
gal-line-a106a42f-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Fairy, you did well this time, but if there's a next time, I hope you'll discuss it with us first.
gal-line-a106a430-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: The request has been added to my to-do list with priority level "do as I deem fit."
gal-line-a106a431-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Thankfully it all ended well, and the Angels of Delusion has made quite some progress too...
gal-line-a106a432-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: But... it's a bit of a shame to keep showing up as a mysterious figure...
gal-line-a106a433-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: "Only variables outside the system can break through the system's tests." Didn't Fairy already explain this? By staying on the outside, we can flexibly respond to events that occur during training.
gal-line-a106a434-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Besides... I'm sure we'll have plenty of chances to meet again in the future. For example, I could buy two tickets to an Angels of Delusion concert...
gal-line-a106a435-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Yeah yeah, you're right Wise! Next time we get the chance, let's go see them live!
gal-line-a106a436-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Nangong, Nangong... what do you think Ms. Cecilia's big surprise will be?
gal-line-a106a437-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: My dear Sunna, that's the twelfth time you've asked~
gal-line-a106a438-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: B—B—But I really want to know... *Sigh* Now that the moment's here, I'm actually getting a bit nervous.
gal-line-a106a439-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: No need to stress, Sunna! My little angels totally crushed it this time!
gal-line-a106a43a-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Rather than calling you the best versions of the Angels of Delusion, I'd say you've shown me a whole new side to the Angels of Delusion~
gal-line-a106a43b-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hehe, looks like our training is paying off, Ms. Cecilia...
gal-line-a106a43c-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Oh right, oh right! The surprise! What's this big surprise you promised, Ms. Cecilia?
gal-line-a106a43d-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: The surprise is... that the Angels of Delusion successfully scored a gig at the 404 Error Live House!
gal-line-a106a43f-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hmm, Sunna's not reacting at all? Oh man, maybe the surprise I prepared was a bit too ordinary...?
gal-line-a106a440-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Ms. Cecilia! Wait a sec! Sunna's passed out!
gal-line-a106a441-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: *Cough cough cough*! I—I'm fine, Ms. Cecilia. D—Did you just say we're going to perform at 404 Live?
gal-line-a106a442-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: That's right! Let's show the audience the best Angels of Delusion!
gal-line-a106a445-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: I... also want to share this good news with the assistant coaches.
gal-line-a106a446-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Yeah, I get you. I was even thinking of inviting them over to the show~
gal-line-a106a447-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Though our time together with the assistant coaches online was brief... I've got this feeling we'll definitely meet again someday.
gal-line-a106a448-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Well then, my little angels better give it their all~ Who knows, your assistant coaches might be watching from the audience at your next performance.
gal-line-a106a449-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: You're right, we can't slack off now~
gal-line-a106a44a-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: We gotta show off the best side of the Angels of Delusion at all times.
gal-line-a106a44b-d1b8-11f0-a010-3d878ea: T—That goes without saying! Of course we'll always be the best Angels of Delusion!
gal-line-c4ed26d0-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Phew, let's call it a day for today's training.
gal-line-c4ed26d1-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: I—I—I wanna practice a bit more. I still can't get the dance steps in the chorus on beat...
gal-line-c4ed26d2-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Me too... The high notes still need some work. Would you all mind going through it with me one more time?
gal-line-c4ed26d3-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm... there's still some parts I wanna practice... Let's just do it once more...
gal-line-c4ed26d4-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hm? What's up with my darlings? Why are you all looking so down?
gal-line-c4ed26d6-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: It's nothing. We just finished training, so everyone's a bit worn out...
gal-line-c4ed26d7-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm, let me give you all a little pep talk~ For all you sweet angels training so hard, I've got a special surprise prepared just for you!
gal-line-c4ed26d9-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Knowing Ms. Cecilia's style, guess it's probably gonna be little hairclips, candy boxes, and other small gifts like that, right?
gal-line-c4ed26da-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Nope~ Hehe, this time I've got a real BIG surprise in store!
gal-line-c4ed26db-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: While I can't tell you just yet, you need to promise me — get ready to welcome this surprise as the best version of the Angels of Delusion you can be!
gal-line-c4ed26dc-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hey, wait, Ms.—  Ah, she hung up...
gal-line-c4ed26dd-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: A—A surprise! I absolutely love surprises! Nangong, Aria, what do you think it would be? Oh, I'm so excited!
gal-line-c4ed26de-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Just waiting for the surprise won't do~ Sunna, don't forget the second part — we gotta welcome it as the best version of the Angels of Delusion!
gal-line-c4ed26df-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: But our recent training... I wouldn't call it our best performance...
gal-line-c4ed26e0-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: *sigh* I guess this is what they call hitting a wall.
gal-line-c4ed26e1-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Is it possible that... if I keep practicing the same way as before, I still won't be able to meet Ms. Cecilia's expectations!?
gal-line-c4ed4de0-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm~ Looks like we'll have to figure this out ourselves and seek some "special" help.
gal-line-c4ed4de1-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah! We can't let Ms. Cecilia down!
gal-line-dbb21771-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: That was amazing! Everyone get ready. We're starting the next note!
gal-line-dbb21773-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Phew... The assistant coaches really love ramping up the difficulty! Thank goodness I managed to hang in there, hehe...
gal-line-dbb21774-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm, looks like our little Sunna's getting good at handling unexpected situations? Ah, Sunna, you're so charming. I'm becoming your fan~
gal-line-dbb21775-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: S—S—Stop talking nonsense! Let's get back to training!
gal-line-dbb23e80-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: La~♪ La...? Eh, it doesn't feel right... How...
gal-line-dbb23e81-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: What's wrong, Aria? Are you feeling sick or...?
gal-line-dbb23e82-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Ah, no no, it's just that there was a bit of... signal interference just now?
gal-line-dbb23e83-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Ugh... maybe it's time to upgrade my network?
gal-line-dbb23e84-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Huh? Is the connection bad or something...?
gal-line-dbb23e85-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Anyway, let's get back to training first! I'm fine~
gal-line-dbb23e86-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Alright, let's move on to the next note.
gal-line-dbb23e88-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: La—♪! Oh no... This note's too high, assistant coaches!
gal-line-dbb23e89-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Looks like the assistant coaches' plan... is to blow the roof off with those high notes~
gal-line-dbb23e8a-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Wise, you raised three keys at once?!
gal-line-dbb23e8b-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: I... I didn't mean to... Let me debug this real quick. Sorry!
gal-line-dbb23e8c-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Junior Belle, I'm still kinda scared...
gal-line-dbb23e8d-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: They say "a tiger's roar makes all beasts tremble in the forest"... If I teach these idols, I just hope they don't scare all their fans away...
gal-line-dbb23e8e-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: We're not going to teach them the tiger's roar, Senior Sister! It's about "Qi" — we're asking you to come down the mountain to teach them how to properly utilize their breathing!
gal-line-dbb23e8f-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Ahem, well... if they could learn even half of your aura, wouldn't they have better control of the stage?
gal-line-dbb23e90-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Hehe, you just hit the nail on the head! Junior Wise is right... I'm ready!
gal-line-dbb23e92-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Hey, assistant coaches~ You're finally here! Today's training is something about... the "art of breathing"?
gal-line-dbb23e93-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: That's right! I am none other than the Master Tiger, invited here to teach you all the "art of breathing"!
gal-line-dbb23e94-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Ms. Tiger's voice... sounds kinda cute...?
gal-line-dbb23e95-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: It's Master Tiger! Master, this is just a little greeting joke... Master?
gal-line-dbb23e96-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Wait... j—j—j—junior! One of our little friends here isn't breathing! Quick! We gotta save her!!
gal-line-dbb23e97-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Huh? No one's... Wait, Aria! Aria, breathe!
gal-line-dbb23e98-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Huh? Ah! Sorry! I'm breathing...! Exhale... inhale...
gal-line-dbb23e99-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: S—S—She's just warming up! Yeah, that's right. She's just holding her breath to get warmed up for training!
gal-line-dbb23e9a-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Phew, that's a relief... Looks like you've mastered the art of playing dead, my friend... You even had me fooled for a second!
gal-line-dbb23e9b-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Ahem! Now that the misunderstanding has been cleared up, let's officially begin the training.
gal-line-dbb23e9c-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Alright, training track... Let's pick this one. And... play!
gal-line-dbb23e9e-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm... Sunna, your breathing is a bit shallow. Watch how I do it — breathe deep and feel your diaphragm expanding, nice and steady...
gal-line-dbb23e9f-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm... focusing my breath using my diaphragm, a bit deeper... Wow, it really works! Singing doesn't feel as tiring anymore!
gal-line-dbb23ea0-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Nangong, your breathing seems a bit rushed... Control your breathing more during big movements – in slowly, and out slowly...
gal-line-dbb23ea1-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Control my breathing with the rhythm of the movements... *exhale*... Wow, it's actually working!
gal-line-dbb23ea4-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Junior Sister, it's my fault for not being skilled enough! I've got nothing to teach Aria! She's a master!
gal-line-dbb23ea5-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Such rock-solid presence... I've only ever felt it from Yixuan Shifu and Banyue Shifu!
gal-line-dbb23ea6-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Um, so... what do I need to do?
gal-line-dbb23ea7-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Master Aria, you've already graduated from this training...
gal-line-dbb23eab-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: My dear juniors, mission accomplished! Nangong and Sunna, you're both such bright and determined kids!
gal-line-dbb23eac-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Thanks for your hard work, Senior Sister!
gal-line-dbb23ead-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Though, I suggest you tweak their training schedule a bit.
gal-line-dbb23eae-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Why do you say that, Senior Sister?
gal-line-dbb23eaf-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: I looked over the training schedule and noticed some of the sessions are pretty intense, even for a mystic...
gal-line-dbb23eb1-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Mm, thanks, Senior. We'll think about it carefully.
gal-line-dbb23eb2-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Alright, I'm logging off now~ Oh, and don't forget to come by the temple for a meal whenever you can... Without you guys around, Junior Yinhu's char siu buns are starting to turn back into plain steamed buns!
gal-line-dbb23eb4-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Maybe... we should tweak the training system a bit. I do think the recent training's been a little too intense...
gal-line-dbb23eb5-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm, although Fairy will control the training intensity... it's still best not to let them practice to the point of exhaustion...
gal-line-dbb23eb6-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah, too much of anything is bad! Overtraining will only hurt your body!
gal-line-dbb23eb7-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Like Master Tiger said, channel your energy to your diaphragm, and breathe in and out slowly...
gal-line-dbb23eb8-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Ugh... I lost control of my breathing again. This is so hard. Master Aria, please teach me~
gal-line-dbb23eb9-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: D—Don't make fun of me! I'm not even sure how this whole "breathing" thing works...
gal-line-dbb23ebb-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Or... maybe we could hit up the assistant coaches and see if they've got any tips?
gal-line-dbb23ebc-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Huh? Whaaaat? I can't seem to connect to the network here. Did the signal drop out?
gal-line-dbb23ebd-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Ah! Let me check if my internet bill is due now...
gal-line-dbb23ebe-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Aria, please~ Could you connect to a public Wi-Fi first, and then help me turn on your hotspot?
gal-line-dbb23ebf-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Geez, I'm not a walking hotspot... Hurry up!
gal-line-dbb23ec0-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Alright, alright, alright~ Aria, you're the best. On it! Now... successfully connected to Aria!
gal-line-dbb23ec1-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm... Since I'm already connected, do I still need to upgrade the network?
gal-line-dbb23ec2-c5f0-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm~ Can't say for sure if it's a network issue yet. Let me check it out real quick.
gal-line-e200d0d0-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Huff... huff... *Takes a sip of water* S—Superstar Sunna, making her entrance~
gal-line-e200d0d1-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hehe... I actually scored a premium VIP ticket with exclusive merch! This is awesome...
gal-line-e200d0d2-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: What premium... Wait, how did I fall asleep...? Aria, wake up, let go of my leg, you're hugging too tight and my foot's gone numb—
gal-line-e200d0d3-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Huh...? Ahhh sorry Nangong, I'll let go right away...
gal-line-e200d0d4-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Don't worry about it. More importantly, looks like we all dozed off... We haven't even properly finished today's training yet...
gal-line-e200d0d5-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: A—About training, there's a message from the assistant coaches: "To my little angels, we're taking a break today, take some time to unwind!"
gal-line-e200d0d6-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Wow! The assistant coaches are such angels~
gal-line-e200d0d7-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hey Aria, have you been feeling like... you're lagging lately?
gal-line-e200d0d8-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Huh? Nope, I'm in top form lately!
gal-line-e200d0d9-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: That's good. Hmm... Now, there's just one last thing to do... I'll tap—
gal-line-e200d0da-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: ...Huh? Strange, just now for a moment...
gal-line-e200d0db-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: I disconnected from the hotspot! Been meaning to do that for ages, hehe~
gal-line-e200d0dc-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: F—Folks in the back, l—lemme see your hands, hehe...
gal-line-e200d0df-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Here are the hands you wanted to see, enjoy~
gal-line-e200d0e0-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Okay, okay... I'm awake now! Stop squishing my face... Waaauuugh...
gal-line-e200d0e1-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Wise, are our adjustments to the training system really working? Everyone seems to be under even more pressure now...
gal-line-e200d0e2-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hmm, I'm a bit skeptical too, since everyone fell asleep from exhaustion during our last online session...
gal-line-e200d0e3-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Could it be... that Fairy rearranged the schedule again? Fairy! Huh, seems like Fairy's not around...
gal-line-e200d0e4-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Let's start today's training then. We can ask her about it after we're done.
gal-line-e200d0e5-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hmm– Today's training course is perfect for the current Angels of Delusion! The assistant should be...
gal-line-e200d0e6-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Well, well, well~ These young'uns nowadays, all of 'em with their fancy ideas. Looks like they need some guidance from lil' ol' me who's been 'round the block.
gal-line-e200d0e7-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: *Gulp* *gulp* Hah... Yeah, Sunna's little schemes have been getting more frequent lately... Here, pour me another! *Gulp*...
gal-line-e200d0e8-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Oh~ That's quite a way to down it, young'un. What flavor of Nitro-Fuel ya got there?
gal-line-e200d0e9-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Of course it's 100% freshly squeezed juice!
gal-line-e200d0ea-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: HAHAHAHAHA! Wow, I had no idea backstage could be this much fun!
gal-line-e200d0eb-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Is... Is this fun...? Ugh, well, at least it's better than being up on stage...
gal-line-e200d0ec-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: I still prefer writing songs backstage... Sure, performing has its happy moments, but getting up there is still too much for me!
gal-line-e200d0ed-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: I still remember my first time on stage... I messed up the very first move, boo hoo...
gal-line-e200d0ee-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Wow, that's super amazing! So you're saying you were the center of attention from your very first step on stage!?
gal-line-e200d0ef-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: W-W-What— I—I don't want to be the center of attention!!!
gal-line-e200d0f0-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Wise, um... did I do something wrong when I launched the connection?
gal-line-e200d0f1-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Heh, I think this is quite nice, and everyone could use a chance to unwind right now. Hey, have you seen Aria?
gal-line-e200d0f3-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hmm... Aria seems pretty out of her element in this kind of atmosphere...
gal-line-e200d0f5-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Assistant coaches! W—We haven't been slacking off, I'm ready for training!
gal-line-e200d0f6-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hey assistant coaches~ What's on the training schedule today?
gal-line-e200d0f7-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Oh come on Sunna, don't be so tense! Today's training is... to kick back and chill! Hehe, everyone can just take it easy and recharge~
gal-line-e200d0f8-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: HHuh, for real? No training today? Long live the assistant coaches!!
gal-line-e200d0f9-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Oh ho? So Sunna doesn't want to train with us that badly, huh? That's kinda heartbreaking...
gal-line-e200d0fa-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: No, no, no! That's not it! I'm actually really happy to be training with you two...
gal-line-e200d0fb-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Alright, alright, Nangong, stop picking on Sunna at a time like this.
gal-line-e200d0fc-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Oh, right! At a happy moment like this, we should... throw an online Nitro-Fuel party!
gal-line-e200d0fd-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Wait wait wait, no you can't!!
gal-line-e200d0fe-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: As expected of Burnice and Piper... They really know how to, uhhh... live life to the fullest...
gal-line-e200d0ff-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Yeah! The assistants Fairy found and the training schedule she arranged are just perfect. Nice work, Fairy!
gal-line-e200d100-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Fairy? Hmm... Strange, there's still no response even after Belle praised her...
gal-line-e200d101-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hold up, Wise... Something's off. There are some extra signal transmission logs on the HDD...
gal-line-e200d103-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Yeah, today's the last training session. Wonder what the final test will be like... I'm so nervous.
gal-line-e200d104-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: ...About the final test, there's something I need to say, and it's about Aria.
gal-line-e200d106-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hmm. Let's look back. Aria, why did you experience those random moments of lag during training?
gal-line-e200d107-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: And why does our training difficulty subtly change every time Aria lags?
gal-line-e200d108-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: And here's something weirder: after I connected with Aria, those random lags just stopped...
gal-line-e200f7e0-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: According to my investigation, there's only one truth. Aria, you are the core of the entire training system!
gal-line-e200f7e2-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Aria is... the core of the entire training system?!
gal-line-e200f7e3-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: I'm just as surprised... For some reason, the training system seems to be built on Aria's local processor.
gal-line-e200f7e4-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Any adjustments made in the system will be directly transmitted to Aria...
gal-line-e200f7e5-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: The changes to the training system will cause Aria's perception to slightly desync from reality, leading to weird reactions during training... Such as spacing out and lagging...
gal-line-e200f7e6-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: I see, so that's how it is... The desync causes the lag. When Nangong connected to me, it cut off my local processing directly, which is why things went back to normal...
gal-line-e200f7e7-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: B—But... shouldn't system adjustments be part of the training plan?
gal-line-e200f7e8-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hmm, seems like there's some mysterious figure behind the scenes, constantly tweaking the training schedule...
gal-line-e200f7e9-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: But here's the thing — seems like someone made some unplanned adjustments. What do you think, Sunna?
gal-line-e200f7eb-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Your eyes are darting away... But you're not the only one. According to my research, Ms. Cecilia and the assistant coaches have all been tweaking the training system too.
gal-line-e200f7ec-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: So you're saying... all these unplanned adjustments piled up and made the current system... a little wonky?
gal-line-e200f7ed-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Hmm, if this keeps up... I'm afraid we'll be facing a veeeery terrifying final test~
gal-line-e200f7ee-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: W—W—What should I do?! I didn't mean to...
gal-line-e200f7ef-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: But don't worry, the omniscient and great Nangong has already figured out a solution~
gal-line-e200f7f0-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: During my previous investigation, by connecting with Aria, I've located the system port. I just need to hit reset and everything will be back to normal!
gal-line-e200f7f1-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: O—Oh, I get it now! As expected of Nangong!
gal-line-e200f7f2-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Humhum, I wouldn't mind a bit more praise~ Now then, here we go, one-click reset! I'm pressing—
gal-line-e200f7f3-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: No! Wait, Nangong, don't press it!
gal-line-e200f7f4-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Input confirmed. Due to a fatal system error, the system will crash in 10 seconds. 10...9...
gal-line-e200f7f5-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Uh oh... looks like I messed up...
gal-line-e200f7f7-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Rest assured. Your excellent and reliable AI assistant will always show up at crucial moments like these.
gal-line-e200f7f8-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Fair... my AI assistant, where have you been all this time!
gal-line-e200f7f9-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: If I'm not mistaken, this... reliable AI assistant must be the one adjusting our training program behind the scenes.
gal-line-e200f7fa-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Not only that... she's also handling our "unplanned" adjustments, so she can resolve the current situation instantly, right?
gal-line-e200f7fb-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Affirmative. You finally understand my efforts behind the scenes. I propose increasing the monthly electricity threshold to 200% of the current value.
gal-line-e200f7fc-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Alright, alright, good job~ At least the problem's solved in the end.
gal-line-e200f7fd-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Note: While the system has been saved from crashing, the changes made are irreversible...
gal-line-e200f7fe-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: The changes are irreversible... wait, that means!
gal-line-e200f800-d1b7-11f0-a010-3d878ea: Affirmative. What you're about to face is a completely unplanned final test.
gal-line-eeeb9430-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: A few days ago, on the first morning of training...
gal-line-eeeb9431-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Fairy!! What's up with this "Professional Idol Assistant Coach" commission?!
gal-line-eeeb9432-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: So the training target is the Angels of Delusion...?
gal-line-eeeb9433-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: No no no, the real issue here is that we don't have any experience training idols at all, Wise!
gal-line-eeeb9434-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Don't worry, Master. New Eridu's most capable AI assistant has already designed and arranged the training schedule for you.
gal-line-eeeb9435-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Additionally, I have screened and contacted suitable assistants to meet the requirement of providing "professional training" to the client.
gal-line-eeeb9436-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: You even contacted others... Fairy, you're moving way too fast!
gal-line-eeeb9437-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: I presume you might need this additional information: The commission fee for this task is ███ Dennies.
gal-line-eeeb9439-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Ahem, Fairy, we'll let it slide this time. But if there's a next time, I hope you'll discuss it with us first.
gal-line-eeeb943a-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Affirmative. The request has been added to my to-do list with priority level "do as I deem fit."
gal-line-eeeb943b-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Suggestion: For this commission, I recommend that you take on the role of "Mystery Assistant Coach."
gal-line-eeeb943c-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Huh? We can't reveal our identities? This feels like I'm on some secret mission...
gal-line-eeeb943d-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: If Fairy suggests this, there must be a reason. At this point, let's just trust her.
gal-line-eeeb943e-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Thank you for your understanding. Your best AI assistant will immediately draft your upcoming training schedule.
gal-line-eeeb943f-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Don't you think Fairy's been acting kinda weird... First taking on this commission by herself, and then actively reaching out to helpers...
gal-line-eeeb9440-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: I have the same feeling... but if she has something in mind, we'll surely find out gradually during this process.
gal-line-eeeb9441-c5ee-11f0-af61-9184941: Well, that's true but... Ah whatever, forget about it! Let's get familiar with the upcoming schedule instead. What's the training plan for day one?
gal-line-f717d2a0-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm~ Special training? I didn't expect the assistant coaches to think I needed some one-on-one practice too~
gal-line-f717d2a1-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: That's just what we call it! All three of you will have to go through it. This way we can better observe each member's unique traits...
gal-line-f717d2a2-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm~ This little bit of dance practice? Easy peasy~
gal-line-f717d2a3-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Wow! Such strong rhythm, and every move hits exactly right...
gal-line-f717d2a4-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: So... next up is vocal training.
gal-line-f717d2a5-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: ♪ La la la la la la la ♪
gal-line-f717d2a6-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm, your breath control is steady, and both the high notes and the runs came out perfectly...
gal-line-f717d2a7-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: All done with today's training? Then I'll log off for now~
gal-line-f717d2a8-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Ah, alright. Good work today, Nangong.
gal-line-f717d2aa-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: As expected of a genius from the Angels of Delusion.
gal-line-f717d2ab-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Note: Observation indicates that Nangong Yu is still in training mode.
gal-line-f717d2ac-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Huh? But today's training schedule is already finished.
gal-line-f717d2ad-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Belle, shall we open a remote link to the practice room?
gal-line-f717d2ae-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Hmm, Aria's overall performance looks good, but this part of the choreography feels a bit stiff. Let's keep that in mind for the next routine.
gal-line-f717d2af-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Sunna... I should give her some extra practice to reinforce the basics, though she's already working really hard.
gal-line-f717d2b0-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: And as for me... during the chorus, my voice still feels a bit dry and rough. Hmm, I'll put in some extra practice on that part tonight.
gal-line-f717d2b1-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Nangong! Why are you still practicing?!
gal-line-f717d2b2-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Whoa, you scared me! Oh, it's you, assistant coach~
gal-line-f717d2b3-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Sunna and Aria's training review... and your own extra practice plan...
gal-line-f717d2b4-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Nangong, so that's what you were busy with! No wonder you finished your daily training so quickly!
gal-line-f717d2b5-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Well, I am the leader, after all~ It's just one of my responsibilities, you know.
gal-line-f717d2b6-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: That's a pretty strict schedule... Nangong, aren't you pushing yourself a bit too hard?
gal-line-f717d2b7-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Yeah, our schedule is already packed, and you're still giving yourself extra practice...
gal-line-f717d2b8-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Don't worry... I've always trained like this, so I'm already used to this level of intensity...
gal-line-f717d2b9-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Listen to the assistant coach, Nangong. That's enough training for today.
gal-line-f717d2ba-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: ...It's my responsibility as leader, so I'm not pushing myself, really.
gal-line-f717d2bb-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: No, no, no! Nangong, you're not allowed to practice anymore today! And from now on, you're sticking to the practice schedule the assistant coaches set for you!
gal-line-f717d2bc-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: ...Hmm~ Alright, if the assistant coach says so... If I keep insisting now, I'd just come off as stubborn.
gal-line-f717d2bd-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: But those training reviews you put together are very useful, so I'll just go ahead and use them as a reference, hehe!
gal-line-f717d2be-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Wow, what a sneaky assistant coach! But hey, as long as it works~
gal-line-f717d2bf-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Heh... we definitely won't let you down, Nangong. Let us carry a bit of that "leader's responsibility" with you.
gal-line-f717d2c0-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: ...Hehe, my assistant coaches are really dependable! Alright then, good night~
gal-line-f717d2c1-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Nangong... She is really incredible, Wise.
gal-line-f717d2c2-c5ed-11f0-af61-9184941: Mm, I suppose that's what you'd call a genius.
growth_label_event_next: Special Training Event will unlock at Lv. {level}
guide_tip_1_1: Welcome to the Training Room! For the next 5 weeks, you'll be serving as an assistant coach alongside the Angels of Delusion.
guide_tip_1_2: Let's start with a simple test to get a preliminary understanding of how our Angels are doing in their training.
guide_tip_2_1: Master, this is the special training ground. Your objective is to earn more points by continuously clearing blocks.
guide_tip_2_10: As expected of you, Master. You have completed the training target of 1,000 points. You may end the current test at any time.
guide_tip_2_2: The blocks will slowly fall from the top, during which you can use the directional buttons to guide the blocks left and right, controlling their landing position.
guide_tip_2_3: While blocks are falling, you can rotate them to a suitable angle. Try rotating a block once, Master.
guide_tip_2_4: When you determine a block is in the right position, you can guide it to drop quickly. Master, this is the perfect opportunity.
guide_tip_2_5: When blocks fill up a row, it will trigger a clearing effect and award corresponding points. The more rows cleared simultaneously, the more points you'll earn.
guide_tip_2_6: Here, I have predicted the next block for you, so you can plan the subsequent guidance, Master.
guide_tip_2_7: If the current block doesn't match the requirements, you can save it first or swap it with a previously saved block for later use.
guide_tip_2_8: I will display your saved blocks here, but please note: during training, you cannot continuously save/switch blocks.
guide_tip_2_9: Now, Master, please begin your guidance with a target score of 1,000.
guide_tip_3_1: You can now set up the training schedule for the Angels of Delusion.
guide_tip_3_2: Here are today's available training options.
guide_tip_3_3: Here are the corresponding training benefits. When a training aspect reaches Lv. 3 and Lv. 5 respectively, Additional Abilities for the Angels of Delusion will be unlocked.
guide_tip_3_4: Click here to complete the arrangement.
guide_tip_3_5: During daily training, you can choose to accompany one member for training.
guide_tip_3_6: Companionship training will increase the member's proficiency. When proficiency reaches Lv. 1/3/6, the corresponding Companionship Event will be unlocked.
guide_tip_3_7: In subsequent tests, you can consume assist attempts to use the Angel Assist skill. Complete the companion training to increase the number of assist attempts.
guide_tip_3_8: Master, if you have decided on your companion, click to proceed to the next step.
guide_tip_4_1: Master, it seems there's a training event awaiting your confirmation. I've marked the source of the event for you. Please select the member to confirm the event.

review_overview_1: To prepare for Ms. Cecilia's surprise in the best way possible, the Angels of Delusion decided to seek some "special" help...
review_overview_10: Master Aria is actually a breathing expert?! "Master Tiger" Ju Fufu's breathing lessons are now in session! After receiving feedback that it was "tough even for mystics," Belle and Wise secretly adjusted the training system...
review_overview_11: What's causing Aria's recent frame drops and lag during training? "Detective" Nangong seems to be catching the scent of something fishy...
review_overview_12: Fun fact: getting a good night's sleep and having sweet dreams is also a way to "train" yourself to face your delusions~
review_overview_13: When it comes to relaxing and taking it easy, nobody gets it quite like Piper and Burnice. But on this cheerful day off, Fairy suddenly vanished without a trace, and the HDD sent out a signal at an unknown moment...
review_overview_14: There's only one truth! Under the investigation of Detective Nangong, the truth behind the training anomaly has finally come to light, but everyone is about to face a completely unplanned final test!
review_overview_15: Let's face the final test with the best of the Angels of Delusion spirit!
review_overview_16: Chaotic systems, tests beyond reason... No matter what challenges lie ahead, nothing can stop the Angels' delusions!
review_overview_17: Thanks to everyone's joint efforts and Fairy's masterful planning, the training commission came to a smooth end. Look forward to meeting the best versions of the Angels of Delusion in the future!
review_overview_18: Inside and out, her desire to bring joy and hope to everyone is as real as it gets!
review_overview_19: When it comes to her singing, she won't let a single detail slide. Never compromise with imperfection!
review_overview_2: To fulfill the commission Fairy took on without asking, Belle and Wise take on the roles of professional assistant coaches to these idols from scratch! But their training method turns out to be... stacking blocks?
review_overview_20: So that's what the fans are saying...
review_overview_21: Time to hype up that down-in-the-dumps angel!
review_overview_22: Every little angel has their own unique set of wings.
review_overview_23: A little miracle sparked by music.
review_overview_24: Even a genius who breezes through training has their own little secret~
review_overview_25: Trust and support mean so much more than Dennies.
review_overview_26: Leave those mischievous little ones to big sis Nangong~
review_overview_3: Under the assistant coaches' expert guidance, the Angels of Delusion have all made quite a bit of progress. As for whether Sunna caught Nangong's little tricks or not... Well, that's another story altogether~
review_overview_6: As our dance steps move past old challenges, what awaits our angels in the future? Why, brand new challenges, of course!
review_overview_7: Making his debut as Mr. Starlight, Billy delivered targeted training to the trio of Angels with his powerful teaching and dance skills. However, after the lesson ended, Billy received a mysterious link...
review_overview_8: The two weeks of hellish training were just of beginner difficulty?! With their own considerations in mind, both Cecilia and Sunna secretly adjusted the training system's parameters. It seems... the training is about to head in an unknown direction.
review_overview_9: In the first half of your singing, I felt your dreams... And in the second half? I felt... the struggle.
rule_desc_1_1:
𒊹 Event Duration

2026/01/30 10:00 – 2026/02/09 03:59 (server time)

𒊹 Requirements

Reach Inter-Knot Lv. 8 to participate in the event.

𒊹 Event Details

During the event, Proxies will act as an assistant coach and train with the angels. Proxies can arrange their training schedule each day, improve the team's abilities, and aim to pass the weekly assessment.

Let's start today's training together, assistant coach~

𒊹 Event Rewards

During the event, complete training missions to obtain the event-exclusive namecard "The Shape of Delusion", Polychromes, and other rewards.

𒊹 Important Notes

1. The exclusive namecard "The Shape of Delusion" is a limited-time reward and cannot be obtained after the event ends. Please participate in the event on time, Proxies.

2. Rewards will be sent via in-game mail. The mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim the rewards in time.

3. The rewards cannot be claimed after the event is over, so don't forget to claim them.

4. This event is for entertainment purposes only and is not related to actual in-game content.

5. This event is subject to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy of miHoYo accounts, and the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy of Zenless Zone Zero. Before participating in this event, you must fully understand and agree to abide by the aforementioned terms and policies.
rule_desc_1_2:
During the event, Proxies will act as an assistant coach and train with the Angels of Delusion.

[Training]

The training will last 4 weeks, with each week consisting of 5 Training Days and 1 Rest Day.

[Training Days]

· During training days, Proxies will need to arrange the angels' schedules and accompany them in training to improve team capabilities (see the Training & Companionship tab in this window).

· After the 5th training day of each week, the angels must take a test (see the Test Instructions tab in this window). The week's training can only be completed by passing the test.

[Rest Days]

· After completing the week's training and passing the test, you'll reach a rest day.

· During rest days, Proxies can choose to retake tests with the angels to achieve higher scores, or revisit previously experienced story content.

· If the next week's training is already unlocked when Proxies complete the current week's training, the upcoming rest day will be skipped, proceeding directly to next week's training instead.

After completing 4 weeks of training, Proxies and the angels will have to face the Final Test. Train hard until then!
rule_desc_2_1:
{img_2011}

· Proxies will need to arrange the angels' training aspect for the angels for each training day.

· Training aspects are key to helping angels achieve high scores in weekly Tests and the Final Test (go to the main interface and click the Abilities button to check out the training content effects).

· There are 4 types of training aspects, with the last 2 types unlocked during Week 2 and Week 3 of training.

{img_2012}

· When training aspects reach Level 3/6, Additional Abilities will be unlocked, which help the angels achieve higher scores in tests.
rule_desc_2_2:
{img_2021}

· After scheduling the training for each day, Proxies must choose 1 angel to train with.

· Training together will increase the corresponding angel's proficiency and grant additional assist attempts.

{img_2022}

· When an angel's proficiency reaches Level 1/3/6, their corresponding Special Training Events will be unlocked .

· Special Training Events can be viewed by clicking on angels with pink speech bubbles or through the Event Archive function.

{img_2023}

· Assist attempts can be used to activate Angel Assists during Tests .
rule_desc_3_1:
{img_3011}

You need to participate in the Test at the end of the 5th training day each week to complete the week's training. During the special training, Proxies need to control the falling blocks' position and orientation through movement and rotation, with the goal of filling up the bottom of the field to clear blocks and earn points!

[Earning Points]

· When blocks fill up an entire row, that row will be cleared and points will be awarded based on the number of blocks cleared.

[Point Bonuses]

· Difficulty: As the cumulative number of cleared rows increases, blocks will fall faster. The faster the blocks fall, the more bonus points you can earn when clearing blocks.

· CRIT: When clearing blocks, there's a chance to trigger a CRIT for bonus points (go to the main interface and click the Abilities button to check the Vocals enhancement effects).

· Lines cleared in one go: Clearing >2 lines in one go earns you bonus points (go to the main interface and click the Abilities button to check the Dance enhancement effects).

· Height: When the maximum height of blocks on the current field reaches certain levels, clearing blocks earns you bonus points (go to the main interface and click the Abilities button to check the Rhythm enhancement effects. Rhythm will unlock when Week 3's special training begins).

· Lucky block: Clearing blocks using a lucky block earns you bonus points (go to the main interface and click the Abilities button to check the Stamina enhancement effects. Stamina will unlock when Week 4's special training begins).
rule_desc_3_2:
{img_3021}

· Blocks with colorful stripes are Lucky Blocks.

· When Lucky Blocks reach the bottom, they instantly clear all blocks in their row and award corresponding points.

· Increase your team's Stamina level to boost Lucky Block appearance rate and points earned from Lucky Block clears.

· Use the Angel Assist - Decisive Blow to turn the currently falling block into a Lucky Block.
rule_desc_3_3:
{img_3031}

· Angel Assists will gradually unlock as Proxies progress through special training.

· Angel Assist is a series of powerful skills that can be actively triggered to turn the tide during Tests.

· Using an Angel Assist consumes Assist Attempts.

· The ultimate Angel Assist will unlock at the beginning of Week 4's special training!

· For details about Angel Assists, go to the main interface, click the Abilities button, and check under the Angel Assist tab.
